metadata.Title: CVE-2022-36402 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An integer overflow vulnerability was found in vmwgfx driver in drivers/gpu/vmxgfx/vmxgfx_execbuf.c in GPU component of Linux kernel with device file '/dev/dri/renderD128 (or Dxxx)'. This flaw allows a local attacker with a user account on the system to gain privilege, causing a denial of service(DoS).

notes.Note: sbeattie> offending call looks to be in vmw_cmd_dx_set_shader_res(). unfixed upstream as of 2023.01.10

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
